resources.string:
Whats new in this version:

* Summary reports for the lists of trips, fill-ups, and expenses. Press the â“˜ in any of these lists to see a summary of the records.
* Enhancements in Bluetooth link detector. You can choose to launch or not the GPS track controller when the link is initiated.
* Enhancements in GPS track service.
* Several bug fixes.

Thank you for using AndiCar.
